title: Halo Trivia
description: A game of trivia based on Halo related questions

title: Word Guess
description: A game where the objective is to guess the MLB players last name

title: Giphy Cars
description: Website that uses GIPHY API to generate car brand gifs, starts and stops on click

title: Train Tracker
description: Using frequency and the time of the first train input by the user this app will display when the next train will come.

title: Summary & Text to Speech
description: Takes an article from wikipedia and summarizes it then reads it aloud

title: Fight Club
description: A fighting game where users select a character and fights a random opponent

title: Stranger Clicks
description: A memory type game where the user clicks on a characters image to score points

title: Premier League News
description: An app that scrapes the premier league website for news articles and provides a summary and link to the full article

title: Educational Game
description: An app that includes spelling and math to help kids learn
